paperzento.title: Paperzento
paperzento.desc: Unleash your technical prowess by presenting innovative research ideas. A platform to bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical application.
rules: Paper should follow the standard IEEE format.
Topics: VLSI, Embedded Systems, Communication, AI/ML, IoT.

circuitrack.title: Circuitrack
circuitrack.desc: A thrilling treasure hunt for electronics enthusiasts! Solve technical riddles to find hidden electronic components and assemble them to build a functional circuit.

techombat.title: Techombat
techombat.desc: The ultimate battle of technical wits! Test your knowledge across various domains of electronics, physics, and current technology trends.

bgmi.title: Battle Grounds Mobile India
bgmi.desc: Gather your squad and drop into the battleground! Strategy, aim, and survival skills will be tested in this ultimate e-sports showdown.

cricket.title: Pro Cricket
cricket.desc: Showcase your cricketing skills in a fast-paced, shorter format of the game. Perfect for those who love the thrill of the chase!

clickzz.title: Clickzz
clickzz.desc: Capture the world through your lens. This event challenges your creativity, composition, and ability to tell a story through a single image.

vlsi.title: VLSI Design Workshop
vlsi.desc: A comprehensive workshop on Very Large Scale Integration. Learn the basics of digital design, Verilog coding, and FPGA implementation.

iot.title: IoT & Cloud Workshop
iot.desc: Step into the world of connected devices! Learn how to interface sensors with NodeMCU/ESP8266 and push data to the AWS Cloud.

perfectpitch.title: Perfect Pitch
perfectpitch.desc: Do you have a billion-dollar idea? Pitch your startup concept to a panel of investors and business experts.

setreset.title: Set Reset
setreset.desc: A pure hardware debugging event. Identify the fault in the circuit and make it work.

turnacoat.title: Turn A Coat
turnacoat.desc: A debate with a twist! Speak for the motion, then switch to speaking against it when the buzzer rings.

freezeframe.title: Freeze Frame
freezeframe.desc: Identify the movie, actor, or scene from a single frozen frame.

sca.title: Start Camera Action
sca.desc: Showcase your directorial skills! Submit your short films for screening.

meme.title: Meme-O-Mania
meme.desc: Create hilarious memes relevant to engineering life or trends.

ipl.title: Pick Ur 11
ipl.desc: Experience the thrill of the auction table! Build your dream IPL team.

geekout.title: Geek Out
geekout.desc: The ultimate pop-culture quiz! Marvel, DC, Anime & more.

badminton.title: Battledore
badminton.desc: Smash your way to victory! A doubles badminton tournament.

network.title: Network Garage
network.desc: Master networking basics and Cisco Packet Tracer.

image.title: Image Processing
image.desc: Intro to Computer Vision with Python & OpenCV.

startup.title: Startup 101
startup.desc: A guide to entrepreneurship by TechieGen.
